resources.string:
Simple Workout Tracker allows you to view your progress pictures and progress graphs online. This allows you to enjoy your progress with richer, bigger graphs.
It allows you to view your progress pictures all together and it allows you to share this with your friends.
You have three options for getting these reports. Buy, Tweet or Facebook Post. Buy is just $0.99, but if you post or tweet about us you will get it for free. Any of the three options will give you unlimited reports for life. What would you like to do?
